resources.string: We are not able to reach our server. Please ensure you have internet turned on.
Unknown error occurred. Please close the application and open again. If error persists, contact your project coordinator
To show app in English, press here
Getting all necessary data to display the app in English
No. I do not want to participate
HTML text for the consent form
You should have received a 16-digit access code from the project coordinator. Please enter that access code below.
You have entered an invalid creation code.
The creation code you have entered is already used. Please contact your project coordinator.
To use Karya, you need to register with our application using your phone number. Please enter your phone number below.
We were unable to send OTP to your number. Please try again later.
We have sent you a 6-digit OTP via SMS. Please enter that OTP below
You have entered an invalid OTP
Please click your profile picture. You can skip this step if you do not want a profile picture
Please choose your gender. If you do not wish to state your gender, you can skip this step
Your phone number is already registered. Please try with another phone number.
We have three questions about your skills in English. For each question, please click tick for yes, and cross for no.
Failed to register new skill for worker
If you know any other language, please select that language below
You have completed tasks that can be submitted to the server. Do you want to submit the tasks now?
This task consists of a set of sentences. The worker is expected to record themselves reading out each sentence, one sentence at a time
This task consists of a set of stories. The worker is expected to record themselves reading out each story, one sentence at a time
This task consists of a set of recordings. The worker is expected to verify the given recording and text.
You have to record yourself speaking out this sentence
To start recording, press this button. It will turn red indicating that the recording has started.
Once you are done recording, press this button again to stop the recording
The app will play back the recorded audio. Listen to it carefully to ensure it is correct and that there is no other background voice.
If your recording is not correct, you can record again using the record button.
If you are happy with the recording, you can press this button to go to the next sentence.
You can press this button to go to the previous sentence.
